pages.index: Sky247 Fantasy Cricket - Create Your Dream Team & Win Big! Sky247 Sky247: Your Ultimate Fantasy Cricket Arena I agree to the Privacy Policy Get Link 100,000+ Active Users Over 100,000 active users participate in our fantasy cricket matches every month, creating their teams and competing for top prizes. 500+ Daily Matches Sky247 hosts over 500 fantasy cricket matches daily, offering you countless opportunities to join in and win. $1,000,000+ Prizes Awarded Our users have won over $1,000,000 in prizes, proving that Sky247 offers some of the most generous rewards in the fantasy cricket world. How to Play Sky247 Fantasy Cricket? Discover the excitement of fantasy cricket with Sky247! Follow our simple steps to create your dream team, join contests, and compete for fantastic prizes. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to fantasy cricket, our platform offers an engaging and rewarding experience. Join Sky247 today and elevate your cricket passion to the next level! Step 1: Register and Log In Start your Sky247 journey by creating an account. Fill in your details, complete the registration process, and log in to access our fantasy cricket platform. Step 2: Choose a Match Browse our list of upcoming cricket matches. Select the match you want to participate in and join the game to start creating your team. Step 3: Create Your Team Build your fantasy cricket team by selecting real players from both teams. You have a budget to manage, so choose your players wisely. Remember to pick a captain and a vice-captain, as they will earn you extra points based on their performance. Step 4: Join a Contest Choose a contest that suits your preferences and budget. Sky247 offers a variety of contests, from free-to-enter games to high-stakes competitions. Step 5: Track Your Performance Once the real match begins, you can track your fantasy team's performance in real-time. Earn points based on the actual performance of the players you have selected in your team. Step 6: Win and Withdraw If your team scores the highest points, you win! Sky247 provides easy and secure withdrawal options for you to claim your winnings. Welcome to Sky247 Fantasy Cricket Platform! Experience the ultimate thrill of fantasy cricket on Sky247! Our platform offers a seamless and engaging fantasy cricket experience that caters to both casual fans and seasoned enthusiasts alike. Create Your Dream Team on Sky247! Join the Action: Sky247 Fantasy Cricket Experience Fantasy Cricket Excellence with Sky247 Elevate Your Cricket Experience: Sky247 Fantasy Unleash Your Cricket Strategy: Sky247 Fantasy Platform Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) on Sky247 Fantasy Cricket How do I get started on Sky247 Fantasy Cricket? To begin, simply register an account on Sky247 and log in. Then, select a match, create your fantasy team, and join a contest to start playing! What is the budget limit for creating a team? Each user has a budget limit to select players for their team. Make sure to manage your budget wisely to create a competitive lineup. How do I earn points in Sky247 Fantasy Cricket? Points are awarded based on the performance of the players you've selected in your fantasy team during the actual match. Runs, wickets, catches, and other actions contribute to your points tally. Can I change my team after joining a contest? Yes, you can make changes to your team before the deadline of the match. Once the match starts, no further changes can be made. How are prizes distributed on Sky247? Prizes are distributed based on the rankings of participants in each contest. The higher your ranking, the bigger your prize! Is Sky247 Fantasy Cricket available on mobile devices? Yes, Sky247 is optimized for mobile devices, allowing you to enjoy fantasy cricket on the go. pages.privacy-policy: Sky247 Fantasy Cricket - Privacy Policy Sky247 Privacy Policy Welcome to the Privacy Policy page of Sky247 Fantasy Cricket. At Sky247, we prioritize the privacy and security of our users' personal information. This policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the data collected from users when they visit our website or use our fantasy cricket platform. Data Collection: We collect personal information such as name, email address, and date of birth to create and manage user accounts on Sky247. Additionally, we may collect device information and browsing data for analytics purposes. Use of Information: The information collected is used to provide and improve our fantasy cricket services, personalize user experience, and communicate with users regarding account-related matters and promotional offers. Data Security: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, firewalls, and access controls. Data Retention: We retain user data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, or as required by law. Users can request deletion of their data at any time. Third-Party Services: We may use third-party service providers to assist with data processing, analytics, and marketing. These providers are contractually obligated to safeguard user information. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Sky247 uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience, analyze website usage, and personalize content and advertisements. User Choices: Users have the option to opt-out of certain data collection and processing activities, such as targeted advertising. They can also manage cookie preferences through browser settings. Children's Privacy: Sky247 is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children, and parental consent is required for underage users. International Data Transfers: User data may be transferred and processed in countries outside of their jurisdiction, where data protection laws may differ. By using Sky247, users consent to such transfers. Updates to Privacy Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Users will be notified of any significant updates. User Rights: Users have certain rights regarding their personal information, including the right to access, correct, or delete data, as well as the right to object to certain processing activities. Consent: By using Sky247, users consent to the collection, processing, and sharing of their personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. Account Security: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials and are encouraged to use strong passwords and enable two-factor authentication. Advertising and Marketing: Sky247 may use user data to deliver targeted advertisements and marketing communications based on user interests and preferences. Data Accuracy: We strive to ensure the accuracy and completeness of user data, and users have the right to request correction of any inaccuracies. Legal Basis for Processing: Our legal basis for processing user data may include consent, contractual necessity, legitimate interests, or compliance with legal obligations. Complaints: Users have the right to lodge complaints regarding our data processing practices with the appropriate supervisory authority.
